703010f-a.text:
Atlantic Avenue, north side, east from the East River to Columbia Place, across Furman Street. The trucks are waiting for the ferry which operates from the foot of Atlantic Avenue to Jersey City, New Jersey. The first of the three buildings at the N.W. corner of Furman Street was torn down (view 2).

P. L. Sperr  View 1: April 29, 1935
View 2: October 15, 1940
703010f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Columbia Place, Brooklyn, NY
